name: topojson
description: Convert GeoJSON to TopoJSON for smaller files and the power of topology!

scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n topojson -o dist/topojson.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs dist/topojson.js -c -m -o dist/topojson.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && zip -j dist/topojson.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/topojson.js dist/topojson.min.js
